programme.title: Fillers
programme.desc: Religious Fillers, Hamd o Naat/ Religious Documentaries.

programme.title: Paigham e Quran
programme.desc: A beautiful recitation of a quarter chapter from the Holy Qur’an, by a renowned Qari, and translation and interpretation of those recited verses in a brief manner.Format: 1+2 (Host+ Qari+ Scholar)Host: Salman GullScholars: Allama Shehzad Mujaddadi, Mufti Muhammad Amir and Mufti Ismail.

programme.title: Q-Qaida
programme.desc: Q Qaida is an introductory program that teaches beginners how to read the Arabic script for Quranic recitation. It starts with the basic Arabic letters and gradually introduces different vowel sounds and Quranic pronunciation rules. It is commonly used to establish a solid foundation for Tajweed and Quranic recitation.Host: Urooj IqbalParticipants: Children Format: Kids learning show (1+3 ).

programme.title: Daura e Tarjuma e Quran
programme.desc: This program contains recitation of the Holy Quran (verse by verse) and interpretation of those verses by renowned religious scholar Shuja Uddin Sheikh.

programme.title: Meri Pehchan
programme.desc: A female talk show having discussion over the persisting customs and norms of the society. Female scholars and experts from different fields of life talk about the origins where those customs, rites and ritual come from or how they evolve with time, how they affect and influence our society, their pros and cons, and what does Islam has to say about them and see what criteria Islam provides to decide over adapting or rejecting to the emerging global changes, say social, technological etc. of today.Format: 1+1 LIVE, Duration: 40 minutes, Host: Sehrish Sheikh.

programme.title: Hayat-e-Sahaba
programme.desc: The program will be based on the discussion on the lives of the Companions of the prophet Muhammad (pbuh). Format: talk show (1+1),Host: Qari Muhammad Younus, Scholar: Tahir Tabbasum.

programme.title: Roshni Sab Kay Leye
programme.desc: Roshni Sab Kay Leye (format 1+3) a program carrying the tag line of ARY Qtv as its Title and covering a vast range of topics related to Islam with support of Quran and Sunnah, the core purpose of program is to gather our mainstream and renowned Ulemas, Mufties and Scholars under one title, on one time slot, making it simple and convenient for our viewers to get interacted with ARY Qtv through this platform. The program hosted by Raees Ahmed.

programme.title: Payam e Mohabbat
programme.desc: This program consist of lectures on vast variety of topics from Quran o Sunnah to Sufism to the contemporary issues faced by the Muslim world. from Gujraat . Islamic Scholars: Dr. Syed Hamid Farooq Bukhari and Pirzada Syed Atiq ur Rehman.

programme.title: Quran Suniay Aur Sunaiyyay
programme.desc: This program is basically design for the viewers who do not find any teacher to correct their recitation of Quran, They may contact on phone to the host for this purpose. Host: Mufti Sohail Raza Amjadi.

programme.title: Daura e Tarjuma e Quran
programme.desc: This program contains recitation of the Holy Quran (verse by verse) and interpretation of those verses by renowned religious scholar Shuja Uddin Sheikh.

programme.title: Religious Hour
programme.desc: Hamd, Naat and chapters from Quran Kareem.

programme.title: Naat Zindagi Hai
programme.desc: This program is specially designed to promote and encourage Naat in today's world. In this program renwoned Naat Khawan celebrities are invited to converse on their sanctified poetry and their experience in this aspect. Viewers' call and their kalam requests also be entertained. Host: Sarwar Hussain Naqshbandi.

programme.title: Qurani Hidayat
programme.desc: A program in which Quranic topics will be discussed. At the end of program, the most important points will be presented in writing with the help of graphics. Format: MonologueScholar : Allama Liaquat Hussain.

programme.title: Sehat Aur Sunnat
programme.desc: This porgram based on Tib e NabaviFormat: MonologueHost: Hakeem Ghalib Agha.

programme.title: Religious Hour
programme.desc: Hamd, Naat and chapters from Quran Kareem.

programme.title: Punj Surah
programme.desc: Recitation of most read Surahs of the Holy Quran.

programme.title: Deen e Fitrat
programme.desc: An exclusive monologue lecture in which Famous scholar Shaikh Mufti Tauqeer practising young muslims in the digital era of world.

programme.title: Fillers
programme.desc: Religious Fillers, Hamd o Naat.

programme.title: Tarteel-ul-Quran
programme.desc: This talk show is based on the recitation of the Holy Quran by renowned Quraas and its translation and elucidation by the renowned Aalim Allama Shahzad Mujaddadi.

programme.title: Kahey Faqeer
programme.desc: An hour of spiritual education where speaker Sarfaraz A Shah highlights the importance of Islamic teaching in our day-to-day lives and how we can balance it. Host: Fahad Ali Kazmi. Speaker: Sarfaraz Shah.

programme.title: Qayadat e Nabawi
programme.desc: Qayadat e Nabawi is a thought-provoking new series that explores the leadership qualities of the Prophet Muhammad.
